SPECS: Serial #EE080400317 Finish/Color: Ebony Weight: 9 lbs Nut Width: 1-11/16" Scale Length: 24.75" Fretboard: Rosewood Frets: 22 General Neck Shape: Slim Taper D Pickup Configuration: 3 Humbuckers Knob and Switch Configuration: 2 Volume 2 Tone ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: This item includes an Epiphone hardshell case and does not include any additional accessories. EXTRAS INCLUDED: D'addario 9-42 Strings PHYSICAL CONDITION: Good - The guitar has lots of oxidation on its gold metal hardware. There are scratches and indentations on the guitar's finish mainly on the front side of the body. Other than that, all the pots, knobs, and switches are intact and in great structural condition. The frets look well maintained and don't have any major divots or wear. Overall, this guitar is in good physical condition.Very Good - The case has some marks on its exterior surface and some oxidation on its hardware. All latches are intact including the handle. All the interior lining and padding is in excellent condition. Overall, the case in very good condition. WORKING CONDITION: Very Good - All control knobs works perfectly, toggle switch and all three pickups work great as well. Overall working condition is very good.  UNPACKAGED WEIGHT: 18 lbs. Returns NEW ITEMS RETURN POLICY If you are not completely happy with a new item that you have purchased, you can return it within 30 days of receipt. Returns on new items are subject to restocking fees if qualifications are not met (See qualifications below). Return shipping costs for new items are the responsibility of the buyer. In this case we provide return shipping at our expense. If free shipping was provided for the item, then our actual cost of shipping will be deducted from the refund. Techno Empire will not reimburse customs, taxes or any other related fees or expenses for any International returns. Returns have to be processed through several departments. Please understand that it may take 1-3 days to complete your refund after receipt of the returned item. QUALIFICATIONS FOR NEW ITEM RETURNS: All new item returns must include everything that came with the original purchase and be in new condition. This includes all packing materials, accessories, manuals and related documentation. Any item returned with missing or damaged packaging or accessories are subject to reasonable devaluation fees to be deducted from the refund amount. Any item returned that shows wear, damage, stains or has retained pet or smoke odors are subject to reasonable devaluation fees to be deducted from the refund amount. All new item returns must receive an RMA number from us before it can be accepted for return. Return items must be repackaged for safe return with the same care in which you received it. Return items must be insured for at least the full value of the item. Any losses incurred because of inadequate insurance or return packaging will be subject to fees charged against the refund. TIPS TO AVOID RESTOCKING FEES ON NEW ITEMS When you receive an item, open the package using a box cutter and be mindful not to tear up or throw away the box or any internal packaging.  Without having to curb your enthusiasm of basking in the glow of your new piece of gear, think in terms of preserving it in its mint condition until certain you are keeping it. For instance, if it were rack gear, we would recommend avoiding racking it until you were certain it was a "keeper". Thus preventing any possible "rack rash" or scratches. If it were a guitar pedal, avoid sticking Velcro on it and mounting to your pedal board until it passed your test to be knighted and sit at your round table of pedals. Although tempting to have both of your favorite things together, put down the chicken wings slathered in barbecue sauce that is dripping all over your leather vest and beard and be sure your hands are clean and dry before trying out your awesome new gear. Pet odors, cigarette and other smoke items can also affect the "newness" of your gear. Also, keep the gear away from your friend with the Billy Ray Cyrus mullet driving the Camaro. He's a good guy and he means well, but years of smoke tar and beer bongs have dulled his perceptions. Observation and application of these tips will help you avoid any restocking fees on new item returns! USED ITEMS RETURN POLICY In the rare case that you receive an item that is not operating as described in the listing, you are welcome to return it for a full refund, store credit or exchange for a used item of equivalent value within 30 days of your receipt of the item, with free return shipping. Items returned damaged, altered or in any way less than the condition you received it are the responsibility of the buyer. Devaluation from damages, costs of repairs or loss of value will be deducted from the refund in addition to the restocking fee. Items returned because of apparent defects, but found upon return to be because of user error are subject to a 15% restocking fee and no refund on shipping expenses. For example, if you returned a guitar pedal or microphone because "it is not working", but it was found that you simply had plugged it in wrong. In this case, we will be glad to send the item back to you with instructions on correct usage, at your further expense for shipping. Techno Empire will not reimburse customs, taxes or any other related fees or expenses for any international returns. Returns have to be processed through several departments. Please understand that it may take 1-3 days to complete your refund after receipt of the returned item. NON-RETURNABLE ITEMS: Items that have been tampered with, altered, modified or where item has been damaged because of buyer negligence, i.e., incorrect voltage, self-repair, exposure to extreme temperatures, moisture damage, or incorrect application, etc. Earphones, microphones or other items that have intimate mouth, face or body contact. Software, computer hardware, computer drives and other digital or media tape. Oversized or freight items. Items that are special orders, discontinued, or closeouts, are all non-returnable. Items that are listed as "not working", "for parts", or "as-is" do not have any warranty or guarantees and cannot be returned for a refund, credit or exchange of any kind. Title: Epiphone Les Paul Black Beauty 3 w/ Hardshell Case Ebony Gold #34361
ConditionDescription:
PHYSICAL CONDITION: Good - The guitar has lots of oxidation on its gold metal hardware. There are scratches and indentations on the guitar's finish mainly on the front side of the body. Other than that, all the pots, knobs, and switches are intact and in great structural condition. The frets look well maintained and don't have any major divots or wear. 

Overall, this guitar is in good physical condition.

Very Good - The case has some marks on its exterior surface and some oxidation on its hardware. All latches are intact including the handle. All the interior lining and padding is in excellent condition. Overall, the case in very good condition.

WORKING CONDITION: Very Good - All control knobs works perfectly, toggle switch and all three pickups work great as well. Overall working condition is very good.

Please click on "Item Description" for more details and photos.
